abstract: Lucid Imagination, a vendor of open source search technologies Lucene and Solr, has landed $10 million in a second round of fuding, VentureBeat reported.
snippet: Lucid Imagination, a vendor of open source search technologies Lucene and Solr, has landed $10 million in a second round of fuding, VentureBeat reported.
lead_paragraph: Lucid Imagination, a commercial vendor of open source search technologies, has landed $10 million in a second round of funding, VentureBeat reported.
